data.title: Anna Lee Transue Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Anna Lee Transue, 88, of Bethlehem died Sunday, October 1, 2023 at Holy Family Manor in Bethlehem.  Born in Allentown, she was the daughter of the late Verna (Brobst) and Earl S...
data.text:
Anna Lee Transue, 88, of Bethlehem died Sunday, October 1, 2023 at Holy Family Manor in Bethlehem. Born in Allentown, she was the daughter of the late Verna (Brobst) and Earl Souders. She was married to Franklin E. Transue for 47 years until his death in 2003.

Anna worked at Murphyâ€™s in Bethlehem as a cashier.

She will be survived by her daughter, Kim Finn wife of Patrick, son, Jeffery Souders, brother, William Schaffer, Grandchildren, Edward Transue (wife Robin), Tiffani Colasanti (husband William), Phillip Cameron, Jeff Souders and James Souders (wife Teresa). Great grandchildren, Alec Transue (wife Senia), Avery Transue (wife Kasey), Aydan Transue, PJ Cameron, Kyra Cameron, Quentin Colasanti. Great Great Grandchildren, Zoe, Savannah, Oliver and Aleila.

Services are private and at the convenience of the family.

To order memorial trees or send flowers to the family in memory of Anna Lee Transue, please visit our flower store.
